conclusion: Determine which container the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles by tracing paths from A, B, C, and D.
Green liquid flows down from A directed by the green baffle towards the left side.
Liquid from A continues down and reaches container E.
Yellow liquid flows from B directed by the yellow baffle initially down then redirected by the white baffle.
Liquid from B flows towards the left-middle part of the image.
Liquid from B continues down and reaches container E.
Orange liquid flows from C directed by the orange baffle down towards the center.
Liquid from C is redirected by the brown baffle towards the right-middle part of the image.
Liquid from C continues down and reaches container F.
Pink liquid flows from D directed by the pink baffle down towards the right side.
Liquid from D continues down and reaches container H.
A flows into E, B flows into E, C flows into F, D flows into H.
Final answer: Liquid from A and B will flow into container E, liquid from C will flow into container F, and liquid from D will flow into container H.
